suite.name: Headers Params Auth

kw.name: Conectar com autenticação por token na API do GitHub
Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mygithubAuth, url=https://api.github.com, headers={'Authorization': 'Bearer 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'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Solicitar os dados do meu usuário
GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://api.github.com/user path_url=/user headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer 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'} body=None

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Meus dados: {'login': 'licask8', 'id': 39626457, 'node_id': 'MDQ6VXNlcjM5NjI2NDU3', 'avatar_url': 'https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/39626457?v=4', 'gravatar_id': '', 'url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8', 'html_url': 'https://github.com/licask8', 'followers_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/followers', 'following_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/following{/other_user}', 'gists_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/gists{/gist_id}', 'starred_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/starred{/owner}{/repo}', 'subscriptions_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/subscriptions', 'organizations_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/orgs', 'repos_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/repos', 'events_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/events{/privacy}', 'received_events_url': 'https://api.github.com/users/licask8/received_events', 'type': 'User', 'site_admin': False, 'name': 'Elielson Francisco', 'company': None, 'blog': '', 'location': 'São Paulo', 'email': None, 'hireable': None, 'bio': 'Sou uma pessoa apaixonada por tecnologia, procurando por conhecimentos em busca de aprimorar minhas habilidades e adquirir mais experiência.', 'twitter_username': None, 'public_repos': 3, 'public_gists': 0, 'followers': 0, 'following': 3, 'created_at': '2018-05-25T14:13:42Z', 'updated_at': '2022-03-14T19:16:37Z'}

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
